topics.body:
I suppose I should mention the details as to why I'm going off-line for a while.
My laptop died. Completely. It just shut off and won't turn on again- even the charging light won't come on when I plug it in. So tomorrow, I have to go take it somewhere to have it looked at. And I am going to be _incredibly_ pissed if they can't fix it.
